attributes.action: state publicly that his government does not support Tony Blair, regarding any future role as President Of The EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Support should be denied on the grounds that he led this country,in the opinion of many,into an illegal and imoral war in Iraq, resulting in the loss of hundreds of thousands of lives. He has alienated the United Kingdom from vast areas of the world and at a time when Europe should be reaching out to promote peace and dialogue, the blood on Tony Blairs hands, makes him an unsuitable figure head.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
